app_descript:
App Description for LINE Let's Get Rich

Brief:

Embark on a thrilling board game adventure with LINE Let's Get Rich! This game combines strategy, luck, and a bit of friendly competition as you roll the dice, travel across the globe, and acquire wealth. Join forces with your friends or challenge them to see who can become the wealthiest tycoon. With exciting gameplay dynamics and a variety of maps to explore, get ready to experience an entertaining quest towards riches like never before!
